name: Lavender Clay
description:
Wash your stress away with lavender infused soap.Wile Lavender essential oils calms you, Sodium Betonite clay absorbs impurities, and softens skin, and goats milk soothes. 


Ingredients Lavender, Patchouli and Vanilla essential oils, Sodium Bentonite Clay, dried Lavender Flowers and Goat's Milk soap.

name: Ladies Citrus Shave
description:
Shave and treat your skin at the same time. A blend of Bergamot, Lemon and lime essential oils lifts the spirits, while Jojoba oil gently moisturizes leaving the skin feeling silky and smooth. Kaolin clay helps the razor glide over the skin for a close, comfortable shave.
This soap is ideal for sensitive skins. No more suffering after a shave.



Ingredients: Bergamot, Lemon and lime essential oils. Jojoba oil, Kaolin clay and goats milk clay

name: Soap & Lavender Pouch Set
description:
Set of two matching pouches (handmade with recycled fabric and lace). One is  filled with dried lavender flowers, the other comes with a soap of your preference from my collection. Ideal for a gift, either to someone you love or to yourself.

You can chose from the list above the tones or colors of your preference, and if you can't find the one you would like, just send me an email with your preference, and I will make it for you if possible.

You can also chose a different design, or even an initial. 

NOTE: If you are in UK or Portugal, before you order, send me a message because there will be a shipment arriving very soon to the distributors in Europe, that way you can save on shipping costs.

name: Cocoa and Vanilla soap
description:
Cocoa is swirled with vanilla to create this sweet-smelling, guilt free treat.
Goat's milk softens and soothes the skin, sweet almond oil lightly moisturizes, and the humectant properties of the honey hold in the moisture, making this a great soap for dry sensitive skin.

Ingredients: Cocoa powder, Sweet almond oils, Vanilla essential oil, Honey, Goat's milk, Glycerin soap, Shea butter soap.

Bars vary weight between 70 and 90 grams.

NOTE: If you are in UK or Portugal, before you order, send me a message because there will be a shipment arriving very soon to the distributors in Europe, that way you can save on shipping costs.

name: Oatmeal, Buttermilk and Honey soap
description:
Soothing and gently exfoliating, this creamy bar has the comforting scent of vanilla. Buttermilk and oatmeal have long been touted as being great for soothing and moisturizing sensitive skin. It smells so good that you feel like eating it!

Ingredients: Shea butter soap, Oatmeal, Buttermilk, Honey and Vanilla essential oil.

NOTE: If you are in UK or Portugal, before you order, send me a message because there will be a shipment arriving very soon to the distributors in Europe, that way you can save on shipping costs.
